mapper.insert: INSERT INTO buy ( buy_code, item_code, user_idx, quantity, color, size, status, date ) VALUES ( #{buy_code}, #{item_code}, #{user_idx}, #{quantity}, #{color}, #{size}, 'ACTIVE', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, i.name as item_name, i.item_img_url, i.price * b.quantity as total_price FROM buy b JOIN item i ON b.item_code = i.item_code WHERE b.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND b.status IN ('ACTIVE', 'CONFIRMED', 'CANCELLED') ORDER BY b.date DESC
